谁发布了关于真菌疾病治疗和诊断的短缺报告世界卫生组织（WHO）今天发表了有史以来的第一份报告，该报告涉及侵入性真菌疾病的严重缺乏药物和诊断工具，表明迫切需要创新的研发（R＆D）来缩小这些空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/who-releases-first-reports-on-nortages-nortages-in-fungal-disease-wareatment-wareatments-wareatments-wartments-and-diarostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/who-releases-first-reports-onports-on-shortages-in-fungal-disease-wareatments-wareatments-wartments-wartments-and-diarostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f20d143-b31c-491f-9d0a-a5cbecc5b143 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 07:45:06 -0400 WHO releases first reports on shortages in fungal disease treatments and diagnostics
高脂饮食与增加乳腺癌转移风险有关肥胖与患乳腺癌患风险的增加有关，并且癌症传播到其他器官（转移）的可能性更大。但是这种关联的原因仍然不太了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/high-fat-diet-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-metastasis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/high-fat-diet-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-metastasis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9cf5b46-C5E8-4B7C-9B33-7810EC74BD37 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 07:41:27 -0400 High-fat diet linked to increased breast cancer metastasis risk

新的AI系统可以增强护士驱动的患者监测并挽救生命一种AI工具，分析了护士的数据和注释何时医院的患者比传统方法早两天恶化，并将死亡的风险降低了35％以上，发现了由哥伦比亚大学研究人员领导的60,000多名患者的长达60,000多名患者的临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/new-ai-system-enhances-nurse-nurse-driven-patient-patient-monitoring-monitoring-and-saves-lives-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/new-ai-system-enhances-nurse-nurse-drive-patient-patient-monitoring-monitoring-and-saves-lives-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=311d328f-37d6-4fe2-AFE2-A61C-7ECECBB9EA0F Wed, 02 Apr 2025 07:34:59 -0400 New AI system enhances nurse-driven patient monitoring and saves lives
